name: Carmageddon Game Data File
summary: Learn about .ZAD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ZAD files are located in the \​ZAD\​ directory of the Carmageddon: Reincarnation installation.
ZAD files are compressed with Zip compression. They can be renamed with the ZIP file extension and decompressed with programs like Corel WinZip or 7-Zip.

description: Compressed game data file used by Carmaggedon: Reincarnation, a car racing game; contains compressed game data that alters gameplay, such as opponents, races, and power-ups; similar to a .ZIP file but uses the ZAD extension.
